column4: Ham nye Jafet hɔn ebusuasantsen a nsuyirii no n’ekyir no wɔwoo hɔn."

column2: "Woyinom hɔn mu na nsuano amanaman fi petsee hɔn asaase do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nyinara hɔn kasaa tse; dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee

column6: nye Sabteka: na Raama ne mba nye Seba

column2: "Na Kus woo Nimrod: ɔno na ɔhyɛɛ ase yɛɛ ɔkatakyi wɔ asaase do."
"Ɔyɛɛ ɔbɔfo kɛse wɔ EWURADZE n’enyim: ma dɛm ntsi wɔse dɛ
column3: ɔbɔfo a ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ EWURADZE n’enyim a ɔtse dɛ Nimrod."

column2: "Asaase no do na ofi kɔr Asiria
column7: "na Resen kuropɔn a ɔda Ninive nye Kala ntamu no."

column8: Kasluhim (a Filistiafo fiir hɔn mu no)

column4: nye Hamatfo: na n’ekyir no na Keenan ebusua ebusua petsee."
dze kodu Gaza; dze nam Sodom nye Gomora nye Adma nye Zeboim

column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee

column4: no mu na Eber mba nyinara fir."

column2: "Na Arpaksad woo Sela; na Sela woo Eber."
"Na Eber woo mba beenu: baako ne dzin dze Peleg; osiandɛ ɔno ne nda mu na mpaapaamu baa asaase do; na no nua ne dzin dze Joktan."

column4: nye Jobab. Woyinom nyinara Joktan mba a."

column2: "Woyinom nye Sem ne mba dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee
"Woyinom nye Noa ne mba hɔn ebusuasantsen; na woyinom hɔn mu na nsuyirii no n’ekyir no amanaman fi petsee asaase do."
